spec.name: imagePrompt
spec.label: Image Prompt
spec.default: A sunset at a beautiful beach

spec.name: voiceOverText
spec.label: Voice Over Text
spec.default: The hills are alive with the sound of music, with songs they have sung for a thousand years. The hills fill my heart with the sound of music. My heart wants to sing every song it hears

nested.help: Enter your [Connection ID](https://json2video.com/dashboard/connections) to use your own API key to connect to the voice model
nested.name: voiceConnectionID
nested.label: Voice Connection ID

nested.help: Choose the voice name depending on the Voice Model used. Check [Azure voice catalogue](https://json2video.com/ai-voices/azure/languages/).
nested.name: voice
nested.label: Voice

nested.help: Choose the transcription model. Start with 'default' and if it does not work fine for your language try 'whisper'
nested.name: subtitlesModel
nested.label: Subtitles Model

nested.help: Choose the font family for the subtitles. Default font is 'Oswald Bold'
nested.name: fontFamily
nested.label: Font Family

nested.help: URL that will be called once the video has been created. This can be a Make.com webhook URL or any other URL
nested.name: make_webhook_url
nested.label: Webhook URL

nested.help: This is a collection of key-value pairs that is passed to the webhook. You can use it to pass along data from this scenerio to the next scenario
nested.name: client_data
nested.label: Client data

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules
